content: At the top of the stairs, you can look left to find the two sets of stairs back down to the Temple Entrance's main path where four Thunder Rhino Masters have gathered -- attacking them from the back will allow you to ambush them one by one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
At the top of the stairs, you can look left to find the two sets of stairs back down to the Temple Entrance's main path where four Thunder Rhino Masters have gathered -- attacking them from the back will allow you to ambush them one by one.
